title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 315.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 315.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The university or campus shall accept requests for records
and produce records during all regular business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
315.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
